title: Requesting RP for Art

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body: Hello all. I'd like to respectfully request 48 RP so that I could purchase a Hextech Key. I hope you enjoy this piece of RP Art that I created. I would have liked to make the mustache a little more defined but unfortunately, I'm not a master of MS Paint.

replies.body:
How'd you get such a nice picture of me without me knowing?!?! 

I guess since you were so sneaky, we could make this trade work. Make sure to double check your RP next time you login!

> I guess since you were so sneaky, we could make this trade work. Make sure to double check your RP next time you login!

Thanks for the assistance Broporo! You could say it was a sketch inspired by my sugar addiction.

This is amazing, would you be willing to sell it for...


1 MIIIIILLLLLIIIONN-

pesos.

> 1 MIIIIILLLLLIIIONN-
> 
> pesos.

It is quite a precious piece of art to me, but I guess I'm willing to part ways with it if you're offering me _that much_ amount of money, amigo.
Bumping this because someone down-voted it for no reason.
